thread.section_title: CurrencyFair Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CurrencyFair | currencyfair.com
thread.title: Garreth F

author: Garreth F
title: Garreth F
text: I have used other providers for FX transactions in the past and have to say that using CurrencyFair has been my best experience so far. Once my ID was verified ( which is a pain regardless who you use ) the transaction itself was very straight forward, the CurrencyFair website is very user friendly. Fees are low and exchange rate seems to be favourable when compared to other providers. Overall a very happy with my experience.
